title: PBE Signups
body:
I have wanted a PBE account for quite a while now. Well, back then I wasn't level 30 so I wasn't able to signup for a PBE account. After I finally reached level 30, I went to the signup page and it told me that I can't sign up right now. So I was like, "Ok, I guess they're not taking any signup responses right now." So I waited for about a month, and I checked back and it still told me the same thing. So I checked the date since they stopped taking signup responses, and it turned out that it was submitted about 7 months ago. Riot, I know you guys are busy trying to make the game as good as possible, but I would love it and same for anyone else that wanted a PBE account if you guys would open the PBE signup page back up or if not at least could you tell me why you guys aren't taking signup responses?

Thanks,
Hyunjae1118

replies.body: I know you're eager to sign up for the PBE, but it's still down for maintenance.  The purpose is to revamp the application system.  I don't have any info or ETA on when it will be restored, but hang tight!
Oh awesome!  Can I have a link to that post?
